an4.130:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these four astounding and amazing things about a wheel-turning monarch. What four?
an4.130:5: "So too, bhikkhus, there are these four astounding and amazing things about Ānanda. What four? "If an assembly of bhikkhus comes to see Ānanda, they are elated when they see him. If Ānanda speaks to them on the Dhamma, they are also elated by his speech, and that assembly of bhikkhus is still unsated when Ānanda falls silent.
an4.130:6: (2) "If an assembly of bhikkhunīs … male lay followers … female lay followers comes to see Ānanda, they are elated when they see him. If Ānanda speaks to them on the Dhamma, they are also elated by his speech, and that assembly of female lay followers is still unsated when Ānanda falls silent.
